comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: A Wilbur C. Fisk was on the Executive Committee of the American Museum of Safety, which awarded medals in April 1916 to three people pictured in neighboring photos. I'm suspicious this is Wilbur C. Fisk (and not Wilbur G. Fisk). See the magazine Safety, (Volumes 4-5) books.google.com/books?id=NsIVAQAAIAAJ&pg=PP8&lpg... Scrolling further down, I see that he was also on the committee involved with the awards. And further down still, I find this picture, at books.google.com/books?id=NsIVAQAAIAAJ&pg=PA56

comment.author: 34904489@N07
comment._content: swanq: Thanks - I think you're right that this is Wilbur C. Fisk based on the links you provided.  Considering the specialized nature of the periodical, I bet they recorded his name correctly!  We will amend this record to reflect the more accurate information.
